comment.author: 51548705@N03
comment._content: Is this area now known as Charlotte's Pass?

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: No.   This is the Koscusko Hotel,  which burned down in about 1951.    It was located on the road from Jindabyne to Perisher,  about 9 kilometres east of Perisher.    When you drive to Perisher now,  there is small lake there.    The old main hotel at Charlottes Pass is the Kosciusko Chalet,     this is the Kosciusko Hotel,  not the same thing.

comment.author: 51548705@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] thanks Mich, great info, the old hotel looks idyllic
